home.title: AI Travel Guide in Your Hand
home.subtitle: Freely without a guide,

stepDescriptions.audioPlay: Listen to the generated guide with audio

home.regionDescription: Explore popular destinations from various regions

guide.introNarrative: Welcome to {location}. This is {locationInfo}, {features}. At {background}, you will have an unforgettable experience. Explore everything {location} has to offer on the journey that begins now.

mypage.description: Check and manage your AI guide records

mypage.personalizedGuideActive: All guides will now be automatically personalized to your personality!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
